Capital allocation. Risk. Strategy. Gray areas.

Humans should decide what matters, not process what doesn't.

The goal isn't fewer humans.

It's humans operating at the right altitude.

When you place a human where code should be, you waste talent.

When you place AI where humans should be, you create risk.

When you get the placement right, your team moves faster while feeling calmer.

Which layer is taking up most of your team's time right now?
